Submodules

src.read_data.save_data module

Created on Tue Mar 1 12:20:48 2022

@author: dgiron

src.read_data.save_data.read_data(file_name)[source]

Function to read the data from a datafile

Parameters

file_name (str) – path to the file.

Raises

InputError – the file does not exist.

Returns

  • data (list) – list with all the images.

  • header (astropy object) – information about the data.
